job_title: Co-op: Deep Packet Inspection Quality Engineer (IRF)
job_description: Co-op Student Position: Summer Term (May - August 2015)Co-op: Deep Packet Inspection Quality Engineer         No. of openings - 2This position is limited to students that are registered in a recognized Co-Op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or University.You will be working with a senior test engineer, to deliver the L3/L4 inspection functionality on the 7x50 family of platforms.Through this, you will gain experience with many tasks:• Hands on experience with provisioning and analysing internet based protocols• Manual hands-on product test; set up test environment including simulators, hardware and workstations• Automation of tests for standard regression environment• Work closely with testers and the developers to resolve issues• Verification of bug fixes for problem closure• Track and report progressIf you want to join our dynamic team of professionals and contribute to some of the most cutting edge technologies on the market, contact Alcatel-Lucent today.
job_requirements: Qualification:3rd year+ co-op student registered in a recognized Co-Op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or University;Engineering or Computer ScienceESSENTIAL:The ideal candidate has some or all of the following qualities:• Experience with Tcl/Tk, Linux and internet applications• Knowledge of test methodology and testing techniques• Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills• Strong sense of ownership and accountability• Good interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills• Works well in a team• Quick learner / self starter• Experience in the analysis of communication protocols• Must be able to work in multiple functional areasDESIRED:• Experience in test automation• Experience with L2, L3 and L4 protocolsAlcatel-Lucent Canada is committed to building a skilled, diverse workforce reflective of Canadian society. As a result, we promote employment equity and encourage women, Aboriginal persons, persons with a disability or members of a visible minority group to apply.Open To All Majors:No
